students.about: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.
I am studying for a B.S. in Cyber-Security at the University of Hawaii, West Oahu. I am graduating in Spring, 2022.
I am studying for a B.S. in Biology at the University of Hawaii, Manoa. I am graduating in Spring, 2022.
I am an Astrophysics major at the University of Hawaii, Manoa. I am in my freshman year and am also interested in engineering and computer science.
I am a Mechanical Engineering major at the University of Hawaii, Manoa. I am a freshman and will expect to graduate in Spring 2026.
I am graduating with a Civil Engineering degree this Spring 2022.
I am an Electrical Engineering major. I currently work at Hollister, but I am interested in engineering internships and projects.

I am a junior majoring in Hawaiian Studies and minoring in Hawaiian Language. I work for Hawaiian educations programs that are supported by the University of Hawaii and plan on graduating Spring 2023.
I am an English Graduate student currently based in Taiwan. I work the for English department at UH Manoa and plan on returning to Hawaii soon.
I am a Nursing student going into my third and final year. I am expected to graduate in Spring 2023 and hope to further my experience at a medical institution here in Hawaii.

companies.description: Online learning opportunities at the University of Hawaii.

Xerox Hawaii opened its doors in 1961 in downtown Honolulu. Since then we have grown to become the largest office technology and solutions provider in Hawaii. We are a local business technology and services provider to businesses in Hawaii, Guam and Saipan. Our team of local experts use a consultative 360 approach to create a customized solution and uncover opportunities to create process automation. We serve all the major islands - Hawaii Island, Maui, Oahu, and Kauai, with service teams and account managers on each island.

Whether you’re a seasoned professional or right out of college, chances are Teach For America has a staff role to fit your aspirations and career goals. Many of our employees are themselves TFA alumni, while others are new to the organization. Staff positions are available across the country.

Join Hawaii’s hometown carrier. The future of travel is looking bright. Now it’s your time to shine. Hawaiian Airlines, Hawaii's largest and longest-serving airline, is hiring across the Islands. This is an airline that's going places — and your career can, too.

Grace Pacific LLC has grown and evolved since the 1920's to become one of Hawaii's most prominent employers. Along with our affiliated companies, GP offers a vibrant work environment driven by a progressive business strategy in a family-oriented atmosphere. Over 550 employees contribute their talent to make our 'Ohana an employer-of-choice throughout Hawaii.

Kamehameha Schools’ current workforce is comprised of full- and part-time, on-call, and seasonal employees who work in various positions at locations across Hawai‘i pae ‘āina (group of islands), including three K-12 campuses, 29 preschools, and other regional and support offices.

projects.description: Analysis on risks for Starbucks to enter a foreign market, the Philippines

projects.description: Created a project management plan on a redo of the failed music festival, Fyre Festival

projects.description: Made tutorial videos for future marching members to refer to

experience.title: Lead Brand Representative
experience.description: Acts as a supervisor for other associates. Displays the best customer service and knowledge as an associate. Provides customer service by tending to customer needs and wants

experience.title: Certified Nurse’s Aide
experience.description:
Worked on the skilled nursing floor to provided residents comfort; transported residents; answered call lights and
requests; and reported any observations to the charge nurse. Completed reports and documentation prior to the end of shift

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: College of Natural Sciences STEM Assistant at UH Manoa. Manage the learning emporium tutoring service. Review curriculum forms. Collect raw data and process it into graphs.
